entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local smoke late this morning and this afternoon. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:09 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
